website_summaries.verdict: Ionized copper keeps pH level stable so that algae can't grow.
pros: Copper ions disrupt algae from growing in pools up to 35,000 gallons
Drastically cuts need for adding chemicals
Stabilizes pH level in chlorine or salt water pools
cons: May take time for results to be apparent

customer_reviews.title: Cloudy pool no more!
customer_reviews.text: Was skeptical at first, but I was willing to do anything to clear my pool. It took about 5 days for my pool to become crystal clear. Not one cloudy day since. Reduced brushing to Had to clean the copper node about once a week. It takes about 4 minutes. Let it rest in a solution of vinegar and salt, the corrosion comes right off.
customer_reviews.author: Erik Rowe

customer_reviews.title: Great device!  Feel better using less chemicals.
customer_reviews.text: Great device. My neighbor turned me on to this and it has been working great in my pool. I used to have a bad algae problem and since this device was in my pool, I haven’t had to use any algaecide. Plus, I have been putting less chlorine in pool. Just a few chlorine tabs and pool has looked great.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Louie

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This product worked great! We installed a pool this summer and had NO algae problems throughout the season. Wish I,knew about this product for our previous pool! Highly recommend it! It was worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: S.T.C.K.S.mazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: I added this to my pool in mid summer in HOT southwest Florida. The results were instant & continuous the rest of the season. Less chlorine tabs used & ZERO algaecide use since adding to pool. HIGHLY recommended for any pool. Want a Happy wife and less pool work during season? GET ONE!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Be careful with this product
customer_reviews.text: I had this in my pool for two days when on the third day I noticed copper colored stains in the bottom of my pool that I now cannot get out! I’m returning this.
customer_reviews.author: Agsrgr8

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Received my new new ionizer this week and placed it in my pool today. I shocked and cleaned my pool to make sure that the ionizer has a fresh start.. The quality seems great with nice, thick plastic, and has a good weight to it. It's much smaller than I anticipated, which I really like. It won't be very apparent when it is floating around the pool. I'll update my review once it has time to work its magic.
customer_reviews.author: Wanderer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FOR POOL
customer_reviews.text: HAD PROBLEMS WITH GREEN ALGAE. AFTER SEVERAL DAYS IN POOL CLEAR WATER IS FANTASTIC. CHLORINE USAGE DROPPED. AFTER SEVERAL MONTHS SMALL AREA HAS SOME BLACK COPPER STAINAGE. EASILY BRUSHED OFF WITH WIRE BRUSH. REMOVED IONIZER FOR A WEEK STAINING STOPPED.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer Jack Schoonover 5 stars

customer_reviews.title: No algae!
customer_reviews.text: This solar ionizer has worked well in my 17,500 gallon pool salt chlorinated pool. Have used for several months. Although frequent testing shows no significant copper level, the copper electrode shows wear requiring brushing on a weekly basis. Water temperature have been in the low 90's, chlorine level has been maintained at 3 with the salt water chlorine generator. Have not had to shock the pool and the water is very clear. No slime or algae so far.
customer_reviews.author: Bonny A. Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Wow! Clear water finally!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! My pool has been cloudy a lot this summer. I was constantly adding chemicals and even faded my liner. I put this on in my little pool 3 days ago and the water is clearer than it's ever been. Took my water sample in yesterday and it's perfectly balanced. That's never happened. It has to be this solar ionizer because that's the only thing I've changed. Well worth the price when you realize how much you can save on chemicals. Makes keeping my pool up much less stressful.
customer_reviews.author: JTBLEXSC

customer_reviews.title: Works great!  Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Does what the company claims. My husband is allergic to chlorine so this is perfect for us. We use very little chlorine, in fact we took it out for a month and just put it back (floating chlorine dispenser) when a few spots appeared. They are gone and our pool sparkles. Highly recommend. We are very happy. Note: we have cleaned the anode twice since 8/19. and back washed our filter 1 time. The little creeper (that's what I call it) works cleaning floor and walls 2 hours per day. This pool is extremely low maintenance and minimal chemicals.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy L. Amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: WISH IT HAD WORKED
customer_reviews.text: I WAS REALLY HOPING THIS WOULD WORK. I FOLLOWED ALL THE DIRECTIONS AND HAD IT IN A 12,000 GAllON POOL IN THE SUN 12 HOURS A DAY FOR OVER 3 WEEKS. NO CHANGE IN THE COPPER LEVEL. I TESTED IT ACROSS THE POOL WITH THE STRIPS. I TESTED IN THE MIDDLE OF THE POOL WITH THE STRIPS AND I FINALLY TESTED IT RIGHT NEXT TO THE IONIZER WITH THE STRIPS AND THERE WAS NO COPPER READING ON THE STRIPS. I AM SORRY TO SAY I CAN'T RECOMMEND THIS. I SENT IT BACK BEFORE THE 30 DAYS WERE UP.
customer_reviews.author: MAN

customer_reviews.title: Super disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t seem to be working. We’ve followed the directions and yet we continue to need the same amounts of chlorine. Algae develops at the same speed with or without this product. Reading these reviews, we thought it would solve our problem, but sadly it seems to be a waste of our money. Really disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: happycamper

customer_reviews.title: Really works!
customer_reviews.text: I was a skeptical after reading the few negative reviews, but thanks to Amazon community, i decided to give it a try. I had mustard algae in our salt water pool, and we tried a product sold by my local pool supply store to no avail. The Pool ionizer took care of my problem within a week. This product works, and to me that is enough reason to give it 5 stars when it comes to value. With respect to durability, still too early to tell, but i already brushed it once, and the spring remain like new after removing the scales. The rod shows pitting, which is normal wear.
customer_reviews.author: DrppSr

customer_reviews.title: My pool is staying clean
customer_reviews.text: This thing has been amazing! I had bad algae in my pool. The owner of the company actually walked me through the step by step process to remove the existing algae from my pool. He had me run my pump/filter 24/7 and backwash the filter twice a day. He told me no device can "remove" algae from my pool, I can only kill it. Once the existing algae was removed and I started using this ionizer, I have had no new algae growth and I am using less chlorine for sure. I highly recommend this product. With the customer service they provided, and how cool this device is, I am hopeful I won't have new algae ever again.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: This thing works like magic
customer_reviews.text: Had a green Pool with the heat, humidity and algae living here in Sarasota Florida. Pool was cloudy with a green appearance nothing seemed to work, Yellow gone, acid, chlorine etc. as advised by the pool store. Then I purchased the Original Solar Pool Ionizer. WOW after two weeks my pool is crystal clear a beautiful blue color and sparkling bright. My neighbor who has the same problem I had came over and said your pool looks outstanding what did you do. I told him about the Ionizer and I know you will shortly have a new customer.
customer_reviews.author: David G Hadden

customer_reviews.title: Best money I have EVER spent!!!! Worth every penny❤️
customer_reviews.text: I can't even explain how much money I put into my parents pull this summer! I could not get the water clear! I took a sample every week four weeks straight, to see what I was doing wrong. The water was cloudy, not so much in the shallow end but very cloudy in the deeper end. Finally I saw a video of this, and I thought why not. It is the best money I have ever spent! It did take about 3 weeks? To see the complete difference! It went from murky cloudy to Crystal clear water! The system best money that I have ever spent!!!
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Algae gone 😀
customer_reviews.text: Owning a pool on Florida comes with issues of controlling algae. For years we have struggled and lost the battle of keeping it out of our pool. I saw this advertisement on Facebook and looked it up on Amazon. I bought it thinking what do I have to lose. After several months of use, I am amazed with how without adding algicide or ,extra chlorine the algae problem is completely gone. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: James A. Handy

customer_reviews.title: It Works!
customer_reviews.text: After 2 weeks, the product is amazing. No new algae. I don’t understand a couple of the negative reviews. I think they didn’t give it enough time. It took a week or so to get enough copper ions in the pool to prevent algae from growing. Now, I get no new algae. Amazing.
customer_reviews.author: BG

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought your Ionizer back in Sept. 2019. I found your product after researching how I could stop my pool from turning green. I have a pool service but three days after he was here my pool was green again and again. I live in South Florida so it is essential that my pool be available for swimming at all times. After using the Ionizer I have not had one day of green, not even after a heavy rain! I think every pool owner should have this, especially if you hate brushing the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn A.

customer_reviews.title: It does work on pools that use well water ( Iron)
customer_reviews.text: It works. It does keep me busy ....every 2-3 days I clean it because it working. I have not added muriatic acid or liquid chlorine to my in ground pool. I have no algae problems since I put it in. I am considering buying a second Solar Pool Ionizer just for added insurance that the pool is keep clean. I do think the cleaning instructions need evaluating. Question : Can you you a cleaning solution to take of the mineral deposits of the Copper collector and filter?
customer_reviews.author: Phil Factor

customer_reviews.title: No more green pool.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Pool used to turn green every week. Not anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Sterling L. Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Grandpas little helper
customer_reviews.text: So far it seems to be doing what they said it would do, but haven't seen any difference in water in the pool. My husband needs all the help he can get keeping our pool clean.
customer_reviews.author: Kay Smith

customer_reviews.title: Interesting Concept
customer_reviews.text: I'm always an optimist.... and think that this is helping in my 20,000 gal pool, but I am not really sure how to measure if it is really working to keep algae at bay. I still use tablets thru the pump, but the water seems to stay clear inspite of all the heavy rains we are having in Houston. I clean it at least once a week.....maybe I should be using 2, but that's an expensive experiment... :-)
customer_reviews.author: Kersten Conway

customer_reviews.title: Definately Helped!
customer_reviews.text: It didn't reduce my chlorene by 80%, may be reduced by 50%. But still a great help. Maybe its my fault, I am a novice in taking care of pool.
customer_reviews.author: Sissi

customer_reviews.title: Must clean pool first for it to work properly
customer_reviews.text: I must admit I was skeptical at first but my pool been crystal clear since I purchased this
customer_reviews.author: Dewayne Evans

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely amazing
customer_reviews.text: We have been fighting algae on side walls of pool for four years. I’ve had this two weeks and OUR POOL IS PERFECT. No algae anywhere. This is worth every penny Times a million.
customer_reviews.author: angie hertel

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Have been having for a while now. Used in combo with chlorine and still having to drain my pool. States can use up to 80% less chlorine in pool, but Copper levels are not as strong as should be. Guess I got a defective item and no way to message seller. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: The ionizer is working as advertised. There is no algae in the pool and I am using much less chemicals to keep the water balanced which is a good claim in a Florida pool in the summer.
customer_reviews.author: Gainesville shopper

customer_reviews.title: Truly works
customer_reviews.text: It’s doing the work and it needs frequent cleaning. Cleaning it is difficult and dirty smelly. Not fun! I love swimming so much more with out chlorine. That’s the big plus!
customer_reviews.author: Kim Erickson

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth it
customer_reviews.text: I really didn't want to get a pool bc of my friends telling me of all the upkeep. I didn't want to spend countless hours and a ton of money on chemicals. I saw on Facebook a friend had bought one of these and was going on and on about how great it was. It took about a week of being in the pool before we really started seeing this thing show off. It really works. I clean it once a week and the only thing we do to our pool is add shock once a week. It's definitely worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Landry

customer_reviews.title: Improves your water feel & quality!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the solar ionizer and within a few days I could notice a difference in the water quality. The water seems incredibly pure vs. “pool water treated by chlorine” before. Haven’t had any issues with it yet and in SW FL where algae outbreaks can occur quickly after a strong rain and high temps, this product has eliminated (so far) having to shock the pool several times a month (or week) after all the rain we get during rainy season. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Pete Senchyshak

customer_reviews.title: barely any chlorine and no algae
customer_reviews.text: after years of battling algae...battling cya from all the chlorine tablets i purchased this product. through the july heat wave my pool is completely clear of algae. im keeping my chlorine level at .5 ppm and the water is sparkling! Thank you for such an innovative product!
customer_reviews.author: all make appliance

customer_reviews.title: Buy this if you have a pool
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't sure if it would work initially but wanted to give it a shot. First week did not see a big difference and forgot about it. Three weeks later I noticed that all the algae were gone! So give it a few weeks and your life will get a lot easier.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Cleared my pool!
customer_reviews.text: Still can't believe that it cleared my pool with hardly any chemicals this year. We've had a great year swimming with very little expenses because of this baby. So glad I bought it.

customer_reviews.title: Great product, does the job!
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing. Since the moment I put it in my pool I have barely had to use chemicals. We have had extremely hot summer days we’re normally I would have a tremendous amount of algae growth in my pool and even with chemicals. I have barely had to use chemicals and there is absolutely no algae growth. The unit just sits there and float it does it’s job. Highly worth purchasing!

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. Its simple and the quality is better than I was expecting. Looking forward to a long AZ summer with less Chlorine.

customer_reviews.title: Works Very Good Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Cant believe within hours of putting it in my pool the water became so clear its mind boggling!!! I highly recommend this for your pool!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really works!
customer_reviews.text: This really works! I tested my pool for chlorine and it was at 0 and my pool still looked great! I still added chlorine but usually I can tell when it's low because it starts to look a little green. The copper peice inside corroded after a month, i wish it came with extras.

customer_reviews.title: Safe way to keep pools clean
customer_reviews.text: This is great. Our pool which had a little green, no longer does

customer_reviews.title: Wish I would have had this at the beginning of the season.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product!!! Does exactly as advertised. I have a really big pool and usually have to put 8 gallons of shock a week to maintain it but since I bought this product I've only used about 4 gallons in 3 weeks and the pool is still crystal clear.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not use with well water
customer_reviews.text: Made everything so much worse. The test strips gave us poor information, and the ionizer turned the green water brown.

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: My pool has never looked so good, and it saves me on my chlorine purchase too

customer_reviews.title: Works pretty darn good
customer_reviews.text: Cleared my pool water up in a couple days crystal clear looks great...still battling yellow alge but getting better

customer_reviews.title: Happy Pool Owner
customer_reviews.text: I was brushing our pool about every week until I started using this product. It has been nearly three weeks since I brushed it last. It doesn't appear at this point to have any algae anywhere in the pool at all. We've been having 100+ temps for the past few weeks and in summers past the algae was a nightmare. The pool is 28,000 gallons and this definitely works!!

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with the purchase

customer_reviews.text: This Solar Pool Ionizer, really works, my pool use to go green, with any little bit of rain, And since we have the storm, which it was the real proof , my pool being CRYSTAL CLEAR SINCE I PUT THE IN THE POOL

customer_reviews.title: It really worked
customer_reviews.text: Works very well we had an issue with water clarity after dropping this in the pool three days later clear water. Love it!

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: So far seems to work well we'll see you in the long run

customer_reviews.text: I have been fighting a green pool forever; not since I got the solar pool ionizer! It is magic. Above ground 12 x 24, 10,000 gallon

customer_reviews.title: Quality of Product poor
customer_reviews.text: I would like to start off by saying that the product appeared to work initially. Then the device started taking in water in the sealed area where the solar chip is located then sank. I ordered a replacement and the replacement does not work.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!

customer_reviews.title: Did not work long enough as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it in June 19, 2019. Seemed to work well for awhile, bt by September pool started getting green despite cleaning the coil. Tried contacting customer service, no luck. Customer service. Please contact me!

customer_reviews.title: Works wonderfully
customer_reviews.text: I use less chemicals. i clean it once a week and my pool looks great all the time. this item is worth the time and the money. Cleaning is easy if you don't let it go too long. I am very happy!

product_meta.title: Original Solar Pool Ionizer | 85% Less Chlorine | Lifetime Replacement Warranty | Kill Algae in Pool | High efficiency | Keeps Pool Cleaner and Clear | Clarifier | Free Buddy Band | Up To 35,000 Gal
product_meta.description:
Original Solar Powered Pool Ionizer. Requires less Chlorine in your pool and Prevents and Kills Algae. We have an industry leading lifetime replacement warranty - see below for details. Other products offer an extended warranty, but charge extra for it.

Details

This automatic pool cleaner uses solar technology to produce electrical current, needed to ionize copper electrodes. The copper ions help govern the growth of algae and other microorganisms. The unit floats in the pool and produces copper ions, while being exposed to sunlight. Within about a week, the product efficiently regulates copper ion level for pool water.

This product makes maintenance incredibly easy, cutting back on time, energy, and money. It is important to note that your pool will still need chlorine and chemicals, but the amount needed is much less than without use of this pool cleaner for in ground and above ground pools. The copper electrode will last for approximately two years.

Depending on the size of pool, you will save anywhere from 250.00 - 750.00 per year in chemicals.

Visit us online (details on package) for detailed instructions. With our lifetime replacement warranty, if your unit is ever broken or stops working, we will replace it for free for the first year and only 50% of sales price after that. Be sure to register the product online within 30 days and you'll automatically receive a 50% discount for copper anode replacement kit.

Outstanding 24/7 Customer Service

Follow the instructions on the package to contact us or simply text 247SUPPORT to 474747.

 If you have a larger pool over 35K gallons, you can buy our newest model CopperFlo Solar Pool Ionizer by searching by ASIN: B07V9P7XRN. It is a high capacity Solar Pool Ionizer and also comes with the same lifetime replacement warranty.
feature_bullets: HIGHEST QUALITY: Solar panel is under thick covering allowing our product to last years longer than our competitors. Beware of cheaply built alternatives. Lifetime Replacement Warranty - see description for details.

Our Solar-Powered Cleaner will prevent algae and reduce the amount of chlorine and chemicals up to 85%. No other chemical product is necessary or recommended. Our ionizers work perfectly fine with small amounts of Chlorine and, consistently, the pH becomes very stable.
The power of the sun works with an underwater ion-disbursing anode to release copper ions that are very effective at killing algae and keeping your pool clean and pure
Covers up to 35,000 gallon pools. Will not harm the finish of your pool or vinyl liner. Works on chlorine or salt pools

Includes a free Buddy Band to protect your Ionizer and pool from unwanted dings, scratches and other damage. See description and package for instructions on how to use and maintain. Product does not contain batteries.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars181 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
